医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新型基因疗法在治疗癫痫患者方面具有潜力新加坡国立大学杨潞龄医学院（NUS Medicine）的研究人员正在研究一种有望治疗癫痫患者的疗法，癫痫是一种神经系统疾病，由大脑活动异常导致反复发作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Novel-gene-therapy-holds-potential-in-treating-病人-with-epilepsy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Novel-gene-therapy-holds-potial-in-treating-病人-with-epilepsy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01486c8d-9b48-4670-9999-0029d494e0a6 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 21:19:02 -0400 Novel gene therapy holds potential in treating patients with epilepsy
大量饮酒会增加心律失常的风险慕尼黑大学医院的研究人员发现，经常参加聚会的人喝大量酒精后会出现心律失常。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Heavy-alcohol-conspiration-linked-with-increased-risk-of-cardiac-arrythmias.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Heavy-alcohol-conspiration-linked-with-increased-risk-of-cardiac-arrythmias.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4aa6267c-f5a0-4366-8194-f3dda8b36205 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 21:04:00 -0400 Heavy alcohol consumption associated with increased risk of cardiac arrhythmias
迷走神经刺激增强小鼠的知觉学习正如音乐家可以通过训练来更敏锐地区分音高的细微差别一样，哺乳动物也可以通过练习来提高解读听觉、视觉和其他感官的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Vagus-nerve-stimulation-enhances-perceptual-learning-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Vagus-nerve-stimulation-enhances-perceptual-learning-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4831603-dcd7-44c6-8a86-194ae1df39cd Wed, 09 Oct 2024 20:48:17 -0400 Vagus nerve stimulation enhances perceptual learning in mice
发现阿尔茨海默病大脑中的转座元件失调，揭示了潜在的治疗靶点研究利用 CRISPR 干扰等先进技术来识别与 TE 相关的风险基因，揭示了患有阿尔茨海默病的衰老人类大脑中普遍存在转座元件 (TE) 失调。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Transposable-elements-found-to-be-dysregulated-in-Alzheimers-brains-revealing-potential-targets-for-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Transposable-elements-found-to-be-dysregulate-in-Alzheimers-brains-revealing-potential-targets-for-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6405d612-7bed-494c-945f-8cfaf871e8ba Wed, 09 Oct 2024 20:47:00 -0400 Transposable elements found to be dysregulated in Alzheimer's brains, revealing potential targets for therapy
突破性研究挑战老年人胶质母细胞瘤的治疗方案由医学博士 Monika E. Hegi 博士和欧洲癌症研究与治疗组织 (EORTC) 总部团队（Felix Oppong Msc、Thierry Gorlia 博士）领导的一项开创性研究表明，老年胶质母细胞瘤患者具有真正未甲基化的 MGMT 启动子无法从替莫唑胺 (TMZ) 治疗中获益，这对当前的治疗方案提出了挑战，并为更个性化的治疗铺平了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Groundwriting-study-challenges-treatment-protocols-for-glioblastoma-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Groundwriting-study-challenges-treatment-protocols-for-glioblastoma-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6577fc6c-e96d-4e51-af1e-ebe821b9c39c Wed, 09 Oct 2024 20:43:54 -0400 Groundbreaking study challenges treatment protocols for glioblastoma in older adults
COVID-19 幸存者心脏病发作、中风和死亡的风险更高根据克利夫兰诊所和南加州大学领导的最新研究，有 COVID-19 病史会使心脏病发作、中风或死亡的风险增加一倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/COVID-19-survivors-at-greater-risk-for-heart-attack-中风-and-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/COVID-19-survivors-at-greater-risk-for-heart-attack-中风-and-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae1ba27f-7995-4443-bfee-8730d7d03b98 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 20:41:21 -0400 COVID-19 survivors at greater risk for heart attack, stroke and death
从幼儿期到童年中期，超加工食品在儿童饮食中占主导地位从幼儿期到童年中期，儿童对超加工食品的消费量不断增加，游离糖和钠的摄入量增加，同时纤维摄入量减少。早期饮食模式显着影响长期健康结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Ultra-processed-foods-dominate-childrens-diets-from-toddlerhood-to-middle-childhood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Ultra-processed-foods-dominate-childrens-diets-from-toddlerhood-to-middle-childhood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=220ab51f-756d-45a7-9927-c018a171be54 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 20:37:00 -0400 Ultra-processed foods dominate children's diets from toddlerhood to middle childhood
基因疗法为脑性肾上腺脑白质营养不良儿童带来希望脑性肾上腺脑白质营养不良 (CALD) 是一种罕见的进行性遗传性脑部疾病，主要出现在年轻男孩中，导致神经功能丧失并最终导致过早死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Gene-therapy-offers-hope-for-children-with-cerebral-adrenoleukodystropy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Gene-therapy-offers-hope-for-children-with-cerebral-adrenoleukodystropy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6dfbefdf-398c-4c8f-a07c-66ca018251e2 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 20:32:18 -0400 Gene therapy offers hope for children with cerebral adrenoleukodystrophy
2 型糖尿病患者肌酸代谢受损卡罗林斯卡医学院发表在《科学转化医学》上的一项新研究表明，2 型糖尿病患者体内分解和转化肌肉中肌酸的蛋白质水平较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Impaired-creatine-metabolism-identified-in-people-with-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Impaired-creatine-metabolism-identified-in-people-with-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=208c3322-a126-47ff-8de1-7e460d6e4cdc Wed, 09 Oct 2024 20:25:34 -0400 Impaired creatine metabolism identified in people with type 2 diabetes
戒烟计划有助于对抗阿片类药物流行吸烟被认为是可预防的残疾和死亡的主要原因。新的研究表明，随着吸烟者每天吸烟数量的增加，他们报告慢性疼痛的发生率更高，处方阿片类药物的使用更多，疼痛导致的严重工作限制以及心理健康状况不佳。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Smoking-cessation-programs-could-help-combat-opioid-epidemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Smoking-cessation-programs-could-help-combat-opioid-epidemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=382e9101-7661-4eba-a9d0-02144c39ad9d Wed, 09 Oct 2024 20:11:00 -0400 Smoking cessation programs could help combat opioid epidemic
